title: It was supposed to be a tax and border bill. It could also hand Trump vast new executive powers
summary: A draft bill released by the House Judiciary Committee would give Trump expansive new executive capabilities – including curtailing the FTC’s antitrust enforcement powers, a move supported by Elon Musk
description: A draft bill released by the House Judiciary Committee would give Trump expansive new executive capabilities – including curtailing the FTC’s antitrust enforcement powers, a move supported by Elon Musk
